name: Worldest One!
description:
·This is a game i made for a school project back in November 2020, they taught us how to make a 3rd person controller in Unity and with my little knowledge of making games and modeling at that moment, I thought replicating something like Mario Galaxy obstacles would be easy to make. 

·The motivation came from remembering  my childhood good old times playing Mario Galaxy on the Wii with da homies! Contains little refernces to SpaceX, Rick&Morty, and one of my favorite games, Outer Wilds.

·The game lacks of many things like game saving, bad optimization and translation (sorry for that, the text is in Basque, if you want to translate it), and the difficulty is a bit unfair. I did what I could at the time :P

·The story basically consists of that Steel Toad (bad Toad) stealed the Grand Star at Toad city, and you are the chosen one to recover the Grand Star.

·Hope you enjoy it!
